display.title: Fluid Replicator
description: An advanced machine capable of replicating fluid placed inside hallow in multiblock structure using energy and UU-Matter.
Fluid Replicator requires 3x3x1 multi-block with hallow in the center.
First layer is made of 8x Reinforced Machine Casing.
Attach machine to multiblock on the same level.
Put fluid to replicate inside hole in multi-block.
Provide energy and UU-MatterUU-Matter to replicate fluid.
You can either use buckets  cells or pipes to extract fluid from internal tank.

subtitle.text: An advanced machine capable of replicating fluid placed inside hallow in multiblock structure using energy and UU-Matter.
